name: Sanction Management System
description: A system that manages sanctions based on absenteeism, with automatic checks and manual triggers.
role: Full-stack Developer - Responsible for building the back-end with Laravel, integrating it with Vue.js for dynamic UI, and ensuring proper database management.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio showcasing projects, skills, and experience, built with Vue.js and TailwindCSS.
role: Front-end Developer - Built a responsive portfolio with Vue.js and TailwindCSS, ensuring a smooth user experience and fast performance.

name: Blog app
description: A dynamic blogging platform built with Laravel 11 and Vue 3, featuring article management, comment support, modular architecture, and a clean TailwindCSS interface.
role: Full-stack Developer - Responsible for building the back-end with Laravel, integrating it with Vue.js for dynamic UI, and ensuring proper database management.
